 a flyMesh object representing the mesh itself.

 the mesh's attached color.

int flag
 indicates if the object has its own 3D orientation (flag==0) or is always camera-aligned (otherwise).

float scale
 the mesh's scaling factor.

Detailed Description

Generic F3D mesh class.

This class implements a generic mesh that is not part of the level structure, but exists on its own in the scene, and can be moved during the simulation.
